attributes.review: Did not know an Oompa Loompa had its own app. Worst experience of my life. Couldn’t even get past the Cheeto on the home screen. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: DUMPO TRUMPO 👎🏼

attributes.review: First off, just absolutely no. This app is the WORST app I’ve ever even came across. The colors are 🤢, the man it’s supporting is EVEN MORE 🤢.
attributes.title: Disgusting, absurd, and downright disrespectful

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see our beloved president and once i opened it a picture of him came up and my phone literally exploded. i had to buy another phone just because of this horrible app. 😡😪
attributes.title: so horrible. do not recommend

attributes.review: This app is not helpful to the American people! It is spreading fake news and propaganda and we will not stand for it!
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review: I got this app to see big Cheeto man but what I saw was a pig and his pig followers being racist I almost the threw up at the site of them
attributes.title: Disgusting and racist

attributes.review: This app stole my bed, sent me a 10 piece chicken nugget, and get this, they pooped in my water!!! Everyone seeing this review, don not download
attributes.title: This app was a no no

attributes.review: This app is horrible it tracked where I live and secret service agents came and held my pet turtle captive. 😢 this app just isn’t it 😒there gonna hold your turtle captive to!😡 DONT GET THIS APP!!!😤
attributes.title: NO

attributes.review: Horrible app, couldn't see for three days after being blinded by orange hair. Do not recommend!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: Why would they make an app about a Cheeto puff, it's kinda boring. Overall it's really not a good app.
attributes.title: Don't download

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I saw a very orange man. When I scrolled further I saw more pictures of the orange man. 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 0/10 this app is bad.
attributes.title: No no no
